SERVICE.name: ItemInquiry
SERVICE.COMMENT: This service implements the Item Inquiry Package of the POS Component Set

ROAD.name: UndoItemListRoad
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed when the operator selects Undo while viewing a filtered search result list of items and there's more results.

ROAD.name: UndoItemSearchRoad
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed when the operator selects Undo after viewing a list of search results generated from an advanced search (ITEM_INFO screen) and there are no more results.

ROAD.name: UndoItemSearchRoad
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed when the operator selects Undo after viewing a list of search results generated from an advance inquiry )and there are no more results.

ROAD.name: AlterationType
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed when an alteration item is entered in the showsalescreen

SITE.name: UndoDisplayItemAction
SITE.COMMENT: This road is traversed when the operator selects Undo after selecting a recommended item from the sell item screeen.

ROAD.name: UndoActionItemList
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed when the operator selects Undo after viewing an item from a search result list or filter of such list.

ROAD.name: UndoActionSearch
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed when the operator selects Undo after performing a price inquiry.

ROAD.name: UndoActionAdvSearch
ROAD.COMMENT: This road is traversed when the operator selects Undo after performing an advance search query and search result has only one item
